summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure to ensure a smooth user experience.
insights: The homepage has the longest load time of all pages, despite passing the test. This could be due to additional resources or heavier content that could be optimized.
The pricing and blog pages have similar performance metrics, suggesting consistent optimization efforts for these pages.
The failed "How It Works" page indicates a need for further investigation and optimization to ensure consistent performance across all pages.
